ygData.subject: Re: A couple questions..
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello everyone. I play a level 4 mage (seemingly the only class on this mailing list) ... and I have a few questions about spells and such. Sorry for the list,
ygData.messageBody:
Hello everyone. I play a level 4 mage (seemingly the only class on this
mailing list)
>>>I am a level9 Shaman!

and I have a few questions about spells and such. Sorry for the
list, but it's the easiest way to get it across.
1. Since you can only use Bind Affinity at level 12, are you basically stuck

in your home town until then? I find this hard to believe, since warriors
might not be able to cast it, but some people have said this to be true.
>>>That is correct. But, you are not limited to staying at home, just limit
how far you go in your travels. If that's Erudin, then yeah, maybe you are
stuck at home.

2. I started training in piercing, and lately I've seen most fellow Erudites

carrying staffs or clubs. Was this a mistake? Does it even matter latter on,

as you'll be fighting in a group and not using melee weapons?
>>> I think that is right too. At higher levels you wont care about melee
at all I think. Then again, I've never played a wizard. My shaman can
fight melee pretty well.

3. Hey, where's the music?!
>>> I think I've heard that music is only set up for SBLive and "SoundFont"
cards. However, I saw a post that they will soon release a patch so it
works with other sound cards as well.

That's all. Any help will be greatly appreciated.

Izin
